item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. We use our own hardware at Fastmail (417 points | 159 comments)
2. The essays of Michel de Montaigne online (129 points | 30 comments)
3. Slow deployment causes meetings (2015) (151 points | 51 comments)
4. 'AI-powered judge' takes boxing closer to brave new world it appears to seek (19 points | 18 comments)
5. Murder Mystery: GCC Builds Failing After Sbuild Refactoring (75 points | 10 comments)
6. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (361 points | 49 comments)
7. The legacy of NeXT lives on in OS X (2012) (69 points | 95 comments)
8. More than 140 Kenya Facebook moderators sue after diagnoses of PTSD (252 points | 242 comments)
9. Feed readers which don't take "no" for an answer (83 points | 75 comments)
10. Translating 10M lines of Java to Kotlin (148 points | 139 comments)
11. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (214 points | 94 comments)
12. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (434 points | 165 comments)
13. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (185 points | 124 comments)
14. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (179 points | 84 comments)
15. Curl removes experimental HTTP back end in Rust (63 points | 14 comments)
16. Keeping a Changelog at Work (2020) (116 points | 45 comments)
17. Rosetta 2 creator leaves Apple to work on Lean full-time (283 points | 83 comments)
18. JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (111 points | 28 comments)

22. Enum of Arrays (123 points | 34 comments)
23. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (192 points | 116 comments)
24. Fault Report – and alternative to Result in F# (46 points | 14 comments)
25. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (126 points | 56 comments)
26. Meet Bex, Kawasaki's Rideable Robot Goat (2022) (25 points | 14 comments)
27. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (43 points | 2 comments)
28. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (112 points | 44 comments)
29. The distribution of eigenvalues of GUE and its minors at fixed index (11 points | 1 comment)
30. Show HN: GitHub-assistant – Natural language questions from your GitHub data (38 points | 11 comments)
